title: Pawn Stars: SHIPWRECK TREASURE is Worth Its Weight in Gold! (Season 2) | History
author: Pawn Stars
description:
Watch all new episodes of Pawn Stars, returning Monday, March 22 at 9/8c, and stay up to date on all of your favorite The HISTORY Channel shows at https://history.com/schedule.

Rick calls in an expert to examine a gold bar that might be an extremely valuable treasure from an old shipwreck, in this clip from Season 2, "Gold Diggers." #PawnStars
Find out more about the show and watch full episodes on our site:
https://histv.co/PawnStars

Check out exclusive The HISTORY Channel content:
History Newsletter - https://histv.co/newsletter
Website - https://histv.co/History
Facebook - https://histv.co/Facebook
Twitter - https://histv.co/Twitter

"Pawn Stars" follows three generations of the Harrison family as they assess the value of items coming in and out of their Gold & Silver Pawn Shop in Las Vegas, from the commonplace to the truly historic.

HISTORY® is the leading destination for award-winning original series and specials that connect viewers with history in an informative, immersive, and entertaining manner across all platforms. The network's all-original programming slate features a roster of hit series, premium documentaries, and scripted event programming.

localize.description:
观看所有新剧集Pawn Stars，将于3月22日星期一9/8c回归，并在https://history.com/schedule，了解您最喜爱的历史频道节目的最新情况。

Rick在第二季 "淘金者 "的这个片段中，请专家来检查一根金条，这根金条可能是来自一艘古老的沉船的极有价值的宝藏。#PawnStars
了解更多关于该剧的信息，并在我们的网站上观看完整的剧集。
https://histv.co/PawnStars

查看历史频道的独家内容。
历史通讯 - https://histv.co/newsletter
网站 - https://histv.co/History
Facebook - https://histv.co/Facebook
Twitter - https://histv.co/Twitter

"典当之星 "讲述了哈里森家族三代人对进出他们位于拉斯维加斯的金银典当行的物品进行价值评估，从普通物品到真正的历史物品。

HISTORY®是屡获殊荣的原创系列节目和特别节目的领头羊，这些节目在所有平台上以信息量大、身临其境和娱乐性强的方式将观众与历史联系起来。该电视网的全原创节目单包括一系列热门系列、优质纪录片和脚本事件节目。
localize.title: 卒星。SHIPWRECK TREASURE值回票价! (第二季) | 历史

localize.description:
觀看所有新劇集Pawn Stars，將於3月22日星期一9/8c迴歸，並在https://history.com/schedule，瞭解您最喜愛的歷史頻道節目的最新情況。

Rick在第二季 "淘金者 "的這個片段中，請專家來檢查一根金條，這根金條可能是來自一艘古老的沉船的極有價值的寶藏。#PawnStars
瞭解更多關於該劇的信息，並在我們的網站上觀看完整的劇集。
https://histv.co/PawnStars

查看歷史頻道的獨家內容。
歷史通訊 - https://histv.co/newsletter
網站 - https://histv.co/History
Facebook - https://histv.co/Facebook
Twitter - https://histv.co/Twitter

"典當之星 "講述了哈里森家族三代人對進出他們位於拉斯維加斯的金銀典當行的物品進行價值評估，從普通物品到真正的歷史物品。

HISTORY®是屢獲殊榮的原創系列節目和特別節目的領頭羊，這些節目在所有平臺上以信息量大、身臨其境和娛樂性強的方式將觀衆與歷史聯繫起來。該電視網的全原創節目單包括一系列熱門系列、優質紀錄片和腳本事件節目。
